title: Sonora and the Eye of the Titans
description: Allora is the last remaining descendant of Zeus and the only hope that Earth has against a Titan invasion. With the help of her bumbling warlock guardian Sasquatch and her three best friends, Allora must find the answers to a complex riddle that will reveal the location of a powerful artifact used during the time of the Titan Wars.
author: T.S. Hall
